original_text: When Pharaoh was angry with his servants and put me and the chief baker in custody in the house of the captain of the guard,
korean_text: 바로께서 종들에게 노하사 나와 떡 굽는 관원장을 친위대장의 집에 가두셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: When Pharaoh was angry with his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 바로가 그의 신하들에게 화가 났을 때

sentences.original_text: and put me and the chief baker in custody
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나와 떡 만드는 우두머리를 감금하고

sentences.original_text: in the house of the captain of the guard,
